verification_strategy.description: Systematic document selection strategy for 1008 attribute verification. Defines preferred document types for each category of attributes.

learnings.income_verification: For self-employed borrowers, use TAX RETURNS over pay stubs. Apply Fannie Mae Form 1084 methodology with trending adjustments for declining income.
learnings.housing_expense_verification: Housing expense is CALCULATED from components (P+I + Taxes + Insurance + HOA + MI). Verify each component separately from source documents.
learnings.calculated_fields: Some 1008 fields are calculated (e.g., Total Housing Expense, Total Monthly Payments). Store these as 'verified' with calculation methodology, then verify components.
learnings.urla_vs_1008: URLA 1003 is the loan APPLICATION (12 pages). Form 1008 is the UNDERWRITING SUMMARY (1 page). URLA contains detailed borrower info; 1008 contains underwriter's key findings.
learnings.document_hierarchy: Final versions > Preliminary versions > Estimates. Exclude: aus_findings, submission documents, transmittal letters.
learnings.ocr_strategy: Use VLM analysis for structured data extraction. Use OCR text for value search and verification. Send relevant excerpts to Claude for validation.

general_principles.preference_order: Primary source documents > Calculated worksheets > Supporting documents
general_principles.minimize_documents: Use single document when possible; multiple only if calculation requires
general_principles.source_hierarchy: Official final documents > Preliminary documents > Estimates

preferred_documents: w_2s (for W-2 employees, most recent year)
pay_stubs (for current income verification, last 2 months)
income.strategy: Tax returns OVER pay stubs for self-employed (more comprehensive, shows sustainability). Pay stubs for W-2 employees (shows current income).
income.calculation_method: Per Fannie Mae Form 1084 for self-employment

housing_expenses.description: Monthly housing payment components (PITI + HOA + Other)
preferred_documents: closing_disclosure (for new loan P&I, taxes, insurance)
housing_expenses.strategy: Use closing disclosure for NEW loan. Use mortgage statement for EXISTING loans. Calculate if components available separately.
housing_expenses.calculation_method: PITI = Principal + Interest + Taxes + Insurance + HOA
examples: Proposed Monthly Total Primary Housing Expense Amount
Proposed Monthly Real Estate Tax Amount

other_monthly_payments.description: Other debt obligations (credit cards, auto loans, etc.)
other_monthly_payments.strategy: Credit report is PRIMARY source for all monthly debt obligations. Shows payment amounts and balances.
other_monthly_payments.calculation_method: Sum of all monthly payments from credit report liabilities
examples: Proposed Monthly All Other Monthly Payments Amount
Proposed Monthly Total Monthly Payments Amount

preferred_documents: Calculated from verified housing expense + other payments
total_monthly_payments.strategy: This is CALCULATED. Verify by adding: Total Primary Housing Expense + All Other Monthly Payments
total_monthly_payments.calculation_method: Housing Payment + Other Debts = Total Monthly Payments
examples: Proposed Monthly Total Monthly Payments Amount

funds_to_close.description: Cash needed to close, verified assets
preferred_documents: bank_statements (for liquid assets, most recent 2 months)
funds_to_close.strategy: Use bank statements for VERIFICATION of liquid assets. Closing disclosure shows REQUIRED amount. Must match or exceed required.
funds_to_close.calculation_method: Sum of verified liquid assets from bank statements, investment accounts, etc.
examples: Borrower Funds To Close Verified Assets Amount

property_values.strategy: Appraisal is PRIMARY for value. Purchase agreement for sales price. Use FINAL versions only.

loan_terms.strategy: Promissory note is PRIMARY source for loan terms. Closing disclosure for verification.
examples: Mort Initial P and I Payment Amount
